content.prompt: The Great Serpent Mound was created in eastern Ohio during the Mississippian period by people who

choices.label: excavated the site to reveal an underground serpentine form
piled up soil to create the form of a serpentine creature
cleared tall prairie grasses to reveal existing, serpentine ridges on a hillside
stacked stones to create a serpentine form between burial sites

topic.text: 5.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
